segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Monitor Installation Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Monitor Installation Page

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Monitor Installation Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Monitor Installation Page

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Monitor Installation Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Monitor Installation Page

segment.source: Use the Monitor Installation page of the Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard to start the sequencing process so that the Sequencer can monitor the application installation activities.
segment.target: Use the Monitor Installation page of the Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard to start the sequencing process so that the Sequencer can monitor the application installation activities.

segment.source: The page contains the elements described in the following table.
segment.target: The page contains the elements described in the following table.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Begin Monitoring
segment.target: Begin Monitoring

segment.source: Starts the monitoring of the sequencing process.
segment.target: Starts the monitoring of the sequencing process.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The Sequencer will minimize so that you can run your application's installer, except on Vista.
segment.target: The Sequencer will minimize so that you can run your application's installer, except on Vista.

segment.source: Stop Monitoring
segment.target: Stop Monitoring

segment.source: Stops the monitoring of the sequencing process.
segment.target: Stops the monitoring of the sequencing process.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The Stop Monitoring button is displayed only after the monitoring process starts.
segment.target: The Stop Monitoring button is displayed only after the monitoring process starts.

segment.source: Back
segment.target: Back

segment.source: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's previous page.
segment.target: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's previous page.

segment.source: Next
segment.target: Next

segment.source: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's next page.
segment.target: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's next page.

segment.source: Cancel
segment.target: Cancel

segment.source: Terminates operation of the Sequencing Wizard.
segment.target: Terminates operation of the Sequencing Wizard.

segment.source: Template Token Value
segment.target: Template Token Value

segment.source: Use the Monitor Installation page of the App-V sequencing wizard to monitor the installation of an application.
segment.target: Use the Monitor Installation page of the App-V sequencing wizard to monitor the installation of an application.

segment.source: The page contains the elements described in the following table.
segment.target: The page contains the elements described in the following table.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Begin Monitoring
segment.target: Begin Monitoring

segment.source: Starts the monitoring of the application installation by the sequencer.
segment.target: Starts the monitoring of the application installation by the sequencer.

segment.source: This option enables the sequencer to record the installation process.
segment.target: This option enables the sequencer to record the installation process.

segment.source: After you click Start Monitoring, you must wait while sequencer prepares the computer for sequencing.
segment.target: After you click Start Monitoring, you must wait while sequencer prepares the computer for sequencing.

segment.source: All new and changed application components will be added to the virtual application package.
segment.target: All new and changed application components will be added to the virtual application package.

segment.source: Stop Monitoring
segment.target: Stop Monitoring

segment.source: Stops the sequencer from recording the installation process.
segment.target: Stops the sequencer from recording the installation process.

segment.source: This button is not available until you click Begin Monitoring.
segment.target: This button is not available until you click Begin Monitoring.

segment.source: Back
segment.target: Back

segment.source: Goes to the previous page of the wizard.
segment.target: Goes to the previous page of the wizard.

segment.source: Next
segment.target: Next

segment.source: Goes to the next page of the wizard.
segment.target: Goes to the next page of the wizard.

segment.source: Cancel
segment.target: Cancel

segment.source: Discards the settings and closes the wizard.
segment.target: Discards the settings and closes the wizard.

segment.source: Template Token Value
segment.target: Template Token Value

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Sequencing Wizard
segment.target: Sequencing Wizard
